Module it.polimi.sw.GC50
Package it.polimi.sw.GC50.model.cards

Class PlayableCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.GC50.model.cards.PlayableCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard
public class PlayableCard extends Object implements Serializable
Represents either front or back of a game card

    • PlayableCard

      public PlayableCard(String code, Color color, int points, Bonus bonus, List<Resource> fixedResources, Corner[] corners)
      Constructs a new PlayableCard instance
      Parameters:
      code - specify the associated .jpg
      color - represents color of the card
      points - represents points associated to the card
      bonus - represents bonus given to the card
      fixedResources - represents resources of the card
      corners - represents card's corners
